activities:
Millward Brown Group, Inc. uses names, contact details, demographic information, and opinions of consumers collected via surveys and other research techniquest, such as focus groups.
Millward Brown also has the need to extract, process, compile, and utilize personally identifiable information the human resource data of current and former employees and job applicants of Millward Brown Group, Inc., its operating divisions, predecessors, successors, divisions, groups and its wholly-owned subsidiaries.
